original_title: 続・股がり天使 旅立ちの朝勃ち
overview: A brothel in a certain town. Itsuki, the number one, was worried about his future. Her lover who pursues her dream with all her might, her colleague who left her shop due to a certain incident, and a newcomer also enter the store.
title: Zoku: Matagari tenshi: Tabidachi no asadachi
